View Data.title: 股票配资欺诈平台，关于是否实盘最新狡辩说辞。
View Data.description: 某配资人在与“同花配资 www.thpeizi.com、www.fxrqd.com”沟通关于是否实盘问题时，同花配资客服解释能提供
View Data.author: admin
View Data.content: <p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">　　某配资人在与“<a href="http://www.peizizhishu.com/plateform_detail/265.html" target="_blank" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(249, 150, 59); text-decoration-line: none; outline: none;">同花配资 www.thpeizi.com、www.fxrqd.com</a>”沟通关于是否实盘问题时，同花配资客服解释能提供电子交割单截图，但是行情软件里查不到下单信息。<br/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><br/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">　　其解释摘自原话“配资账户跟正规账户是不一样的，挂单是有的，只是被券商进行屏蔽了，投顾的资金是不允许出现在行情上面的。”</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><br/></p><p><img src="http://www.peizizhishu.com/storage/wangeditor/20190308/356a7df6-2ec6-4e0f-8084-cc2ac5beda50.jpg"/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center;"><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(249, 150, 59);">该配资人与“同花配资”沟通截图&nbsp;</span><br/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center;"><br/></p><p><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">　　近期有数个虚拟盘配资平台都用该借口向配资人进行解释，如同不给客户提现时说账户被证监会监管冻结一说，借口非常劣拙。望广大配资人能及时甄别。</span></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><br/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center;"><br/></p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">能证明实盘的两条途径：<br/>1.有券商盖章的纸质交割单，非平台提供的交割单电子版截图；<br/>2.下单时，行情软件的分时成交明细里能看到数据的变化。<br/>除此之外均不能证明是实盘。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">所谓秒提现、秒开户、秒到账，只有虚拟盘才能做到。</p><p style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, sans-serif; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><br/>最后，“<span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 26px; font-weight: bold;"><a href="http://www.peizizhishu.com/" class="keyword" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red; text-decoration-line: none; outline: none;">配资指数</a>&nbsp;peizizhishu.com</span>”祝广大配资人配资顺利！</p><p><br/></p>

white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);&quot;&gt;　　某配资人在与“&lt;a href=&quot;http://www.peizizhishu.com/plateform_detail/265.html&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; style=&quot;margin: 0px;
